name: Nat.card_perm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Finite α
⊢ Eq (Nat.card (Equiv.Perm α)) (Nat.card α).factorial
decl:
theorem card_perm {α : Type*} [Finite α] : Nat.card (Equiv.Perm α) = (Nat.card α)! := by
  classical
  have := Fintype.ofFinite α
  rw [card_eq_fintype_card, card_eq_fintype_card, Fintype.card_perm]
